Label.text: Because we're on a mission to empower your privacy rights, we've tried to make the permissions clearer and more specific than the vague descriptions normally used in apps.

Span.text: A permission allows Dikota to use a functionality of your device to provide a service - such as using the phone's location to find nearby users. All device permissions are optional and can be approved or denied in your device settings at any time.

Label.text: The following are the permissions we ask for with Dikota. To learn more about data we collect, visit the Data Collection section.
